items.summary: Update the UserListTable component (frontend/src/components/admin/UserListTable.tsx) to implement a mobile-responsive stacked layout where each user is displayed as a card instead of a table row on small screens (< 768px), with the user's information (Username, WhatsApp Number, Status badge) stacked vertically and the 'Approve' button positioned directly below the status badge within each card.

Style the mobile card layout in UserListTable with proper spacing, borders, and background colors consistent with the site's dark theme and premium styling, ensuring each card is visually distinct and the 'Approve' button has adequate touch target size (minimum 44x44px) for mobile usability.
